properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 22 at 10:23AM CST until January 24 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama...
Mississippi...

Tombigbee River Near Coffeeville Dam affecting Choctaw...Clarke and Washington
Counties.
Tombigbee River Near Leroy affecting Choctaw...Clarke and Washington Counties.
Leaf Near Mclain affecting George...Greene and Perry Counties.
Pascagoula At Merrill affecting George...Greene and Jackson Counties.
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama...
Mississippi...

Mobile River At Barry Steam Plant affecting Baldwin and Mobile Counties.
Chickasawhay At Leakesville affecting George...Greene and Wayne Counties.

.Recent heavy rains have caused significant rises along the river.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mobile River At Barry Steam Plant
* From tomorrow morning until late Thursday night.
* At 9AM Wednesday the stage was 11.7 feet.
* No flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 12.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by tomorrow morning and continue to rise
near 12.0 feet by tomorrow morning. The river will fall below flood stage by tomorrow evening.
* At 12.0 feet...Considerable overflow of lowlands in the area. A few county
roads become flooded.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...
Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather radio.
